message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to own a product from our exclusive collection. With 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, the chances are slim but the potential reward is huge! I'm confident that this product has the potential to exceed your expectations. Would you like to take a chance and make it yours for $10000?
I believe in the potential of your product and am willing to take the risk for $10000.

As you may know, our products have a 33.33% chance of being high-quality, and I'm excited to say that this one is indeed one of the good ones! I trust your recommendation and would like to purchase the product.
